SEARCH
Package bcm.components

Class NodeComponent

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
bcm.components.NodeComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.network.interfaces.SensorNodeP2PImplI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.nodes.interfaces.RequestingImplI
public class NodeComponent extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent implements fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.nodes.interfaces.RequestingImplI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.network.interfaces.SensorNodeP2PImplI

Description

The class NodeComponent implements the component representing a sensor node in the sensor network. It is responsible for the management of the node's lifecycle, it contains the sensor data and the node's information.
